summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the construction and acquisition of, certain additions and betterments to, and extensions of, the municipal light and power plant and system, and payment therefor out of funds provided for in, and designating the same as additions, betterments, and extensions contemplated by, Ordinance No. 50049; authorizing and directing the preparation of plans and specifications therefor; and authorizing expenditures and appropriating funds therefor.
